title.rendered: Concerts During NFR 2022: Things to do during the NFR week in Las Vegas

content.rendered:
Rodeo Vegas at The Mirage is back. Experience free NFR live streaming, free live entertainment, drink specials and giveaways nightly. Whether you’re a cowboy for life or just for the weekend, The Mirage is where you want to Rodeo Vegas.

Concerts During NFR 2021 in Las Vegas

If you’ve never been to the Wrangler National Finals Rodeo (NFR) in Las Vegas, this is an event you must attend, at least once in a lifetime. 2021 marks the 37th year for the Wrangler NFR to be held in Las Vegas. Don’t miss all the action before and after the NFR each night at the Cowboy Corral located at the Cox Pavilion, next to the Thomas & Mack Center. Get to the arena an hour early and head over to the Cowboy Corral. Keep up your heels and enjoy live entertainment.

  • Reba, Brooks & Dunn, Dec. 1, 3, 4, 7, 8, 10 and 11 The Colosseum at the Caesars Palace
  • Journey, Dec. 1, 2, 7, 8, 10 and 11 The Theater at Virgin Hotels Las Vegas
  • Just Dave Band, Dec. 1 and 2 The Gilley’s Saloon at Treasure Island
  • Cody Jinks, Dec. 2, 3 and 5 The Chelsea at The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas
  • Shania Twain, Dec. 2, 4, 5, 9 and 11 The Zappos Theater at Planet Hollywood Hotel & Casino
  • Foo Fighters, Dec. 2 and 4 The Park Theater at Park MGM
  • Eston Corbin, Dec. 2 Money, Baby! at Virgin Hotels Las Vegas
  • Ned Ledoux, Dec. 2 and 3 Veil Pavilion at Silverton Casino Hotel
  • Casey Donahew, Dec.2 and 5 The Mirage Race & Sports Book at The Mirage Resort & Casino
  • Jo Dee Messina, Dec. 2 The Showroom at Golden Nugget
  • Aaron Watson, Dec. 2 – 5 South Point Showroom at South Point
  • Little Big Town, Dec. 3 and 4 The Theater at Virgin Hotels Las Vegas
  • Carlos Santana, Dec. 3, 4, 5, 8, 10 and 11 House of Blues Music Hall at Mandalay Bay
  • Drake Milligan, Dec. 3 Money, Baby! at Virgin Hotels Las Vegas
  • George Strait, Dec. 3 and 4 T-Mobile Arena at Blvd S, Las Vegas
  • Riley Green, Dec. 3,4, 10 and 11 Dawg House Saloon at Resorts World
  • Rodney Carrington, Dec. 3, 4, 10 and 11 David Coperfield Theater at MGM Grand
  • Shane Smith and Saints, Dec. 3 Brooklyn Bowl
  • Ian Munsick, Dec. 3 Brooklyn Bowl
  • LOCASH, Dec. 3 The Mirage Race & Sports Book at The Mirage Resort & Casino
  • Michael Austin, Dec. 3 – 5 Gilley’s Saloon at Theasure Island
  • Tammy Graham Band, Dec. 3 and 10 Freedom Beat at Downtown Grand Hotel & Casino
  • Brantley Gilbert, Dec. The Cleasea at The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas
  • John Michael Montgomery, Dec. 4 The Showroom at Golden Nugget
  • Josh Turner, Dec. 4 The Venetian Theater at Venetian
  • Thrillbilly Deluxe, Dec. 4 Veil Pavilion at Silverton Casino Hotel
  • David Lee Murphy, Dec. 4 Money, Baby! at Virgin Hotels Las Vegas
  • Devin Dawson, Dec. 4 The Mirage Race & Sports Book at The Mirage Resort & Casino
  • Rustyn Vaughn Lee Band, Dec. 4 and 11 Freedom Beat at Downtown Grand Hotel & Casino
  • Zach Winningham, Dec. 4 – 6 Freedom Beat at Downtown Grand Hotel & Casino
  • Jenna LaMaster, Dec. 5 Money, Baby! at Virgin Hotels Las Vegas
  • Jenn Ford, Dec. 5 and 6 Veil Pavilion at Silverton Casino Hotel
  • Ray Wylie Hubbard, Dec. 5 The Showroom at Golden Nugget
  • Wyatt McCubbin, Dec. 6 Money, Baby! at Virgin Hotels Las Vegas
  • Eli Young Band, Dec. 6 The Mirage Race & Sports Book at The Mirage Resort & Casino
  • Kevin Fowler, Dec. 6 and 7 Gilley’s Saloon at Treasure Island
  • Scotty Alexander, Dec. 6 – 9 Gilley’s Saloon at Treasure Island
  • Ronnie Milsap, Dec. 6 The Showroom at Golden Nugget
  • Chancey Williams, Dec. 6 – 8 South Point Showroom at South Point
  • William Michael Morgan, Dec. 7 Money, Baby! at Virgin Hotels Las Vegas
  • The Heers Turner Oversize Band, Dec. 7 and 8 Veil Pavilion at Silverton Casino Hotel
  • Glen Templeton, Dec. 7 and 8 The Mirage Race & Sports Book at The Mirage Resort & Casino
  • Tracy Lawrence, Dec. 7 The Showroom at Golden Nugget
  • Jim Gaffigan, Dec. 8 Encore Theater at Encore Las Vegas
  • Cody Johnson, Dec. 8 and 9 The Cleasea at The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas
  • Will Jones, Dec. 8 Money, Baby! at Virgin Hotels Las Vegas
  • Terri Clark, Dec.8 The Showroom at Golden Nugget
  • Recless Kelly, Dec. 8 and 9 Gilley’s Saloon at Treasure Island
  • Nate Bargatze, Dec. 9 Wynn Las Vegas
  • Glen Tempeton, Dec. 9 Money, Baby! at Virgin Hotels Las Vegas
  • Josh ward & Randy Brown, Dec. 9 and 10 Veil Pavilion at Silverton Casino Hotel
  • Janson Aldean, Dec. 9 – 11 Park Theater at Park MGM
  • Josh Abbott Band, Dec. 9 The Mirage Race & Sports Book at The Mirage Resort & Casino
  • John Anderson, Dec. 9 The Showroom at Golden Nugget
  • Randall King, Dec. 9 – 11 South Point Showroom at South Point
  • Dierks Bentley, Dec. 10 and 11 The Cleasea at The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas
  • Tyler Booth, Dec. 10 Money, Baby! at Virgin Hotels Las Vegas
  • Nelly, Dec. 10 Brooklyn Bowl
  • Red Shahan, Dec. 10 Brooklyn Bowl
  • Ian Munsick, Dec. 10 The Mirage Race & Sports Book at The Mirage Resort & Casino
  • Rob Staley, Dec. 10 and 11 Gilley’s Saloon at Treasure island
  • Jamey Johnson, Dec. 10 The Showroom at Golden Nugget
  • Lisa Marie, Dec. 11 Freedom Beat at Downtown Grand Hotel & Casino
  • American Thunder, Dec. 11 Veil Pavilion at Silverton Casino Hotel
  • Heath Sanders, Dec. 11 Money, Baby! at Virgin Hotels Las Vegas
  • Randy Houser, Dec. 11 The Mirage Race & Sports Book at The Mirage Resort & Casino

We will continue to add great entertainment to the list below. Keep checking back to see who we add next.
